source_sink::source_if Interface Reference

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

subroutine source_if (source, conc, area, flow, ncell, nvar, time)

Detailed Description

Calculate source.

Generic interface for calculating source that should be fulfilled by client programs. The source is calculated using concentration, and produces a source increment appropriate for primitives. If you want to increment a conservative variable with this source, call prim_increment_to_cons()

Constructor & Destructor Documentation
